name: Galarian Mr. Mime

evolution.description: Galarian Mr. Mime can evolve into Mr. Rime at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Dancing Pokémon. Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.

abilities.name: Screen Cleaner
abilities.description: Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil have no effect within 40ft of this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: While it is snowing or hailing, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency modifier at the end of each of its turns.
